main event: Multiple bright objects resembling flying saucers were reported by numerous witnesses in Baltimore, Maryland on July 7, 1955.
interesting points: Eyewitnesses described the objects as saucer-shaped, round, and glowing spheres, and reported them moving rapidly and hovering motionless before accelerating away at high speeds.
The reports came from hundreds of residents in Baltimore and its suburbs, with some witnesses claiming to have chased the objects by car.
The observed objects appeared to change color as they passed overhead, emitting a glow or luminescence of yellowish-white color.
Despite the conclusion that one sighting was likely a distant balloon, others remain unexplained and of no further significance.
One report included physical evidence in the form of five 13"x18" photographs and particles of the observed object.
sighted object: multiple bright objects resembling flying saucers
photographs: no, except for a mention of photographic evidence in one report
